name: Magic 8 Ball +
description:
What should i eat? What movie should i watch??
What is my next pet? What is my next job?
The Magic 8 Ball + decides for you!

Features:
- 21 oracles
- 3 answer categories: Decisions, Quotes or Games
- Play "Truth or Dare" and "Never have i ever" with the oracles
- Quotes for many situations
- Share the answers with your friends
